channel.title: Overview on Jose Alquicira Hernandez

item.title: scPred integration with Seurat
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll show how to incorporate prediction analyses using Seurat along with scPred. First, we’ll load scPred and the tidyverse: library(scPred) library(tidyverse) Let’s load Seurat: library(Seurat) We’ll work with a dataset obtained to analyze the ventral midbrain development in human (see Molecular Diversity of Midbrain Development in Mouse, Human, and Stem Cells). The data will be downloaded from Hemberg’s lab: download.file("https://scrnaseq-public-datasets.s3.amazonaws.com/scater-objects/manno_human.rds", destfile = "~/Downloads/manno_human.rds") Then we import the data and conver thescater object into Seurat
